name: UITitlebar
desc: An object that you use to configure the title bar of a window in a Mac app built with Mac Catalyst.

items.name: var separatorStyle: UITitlebarSeparatorStyle
items.desc: The type of separator that the app displays between the title bar and content of a window.

items.name: enum UITitlebarSeparatorStyle
items.desc: Styles that determine the type of separator displayed between the title bar and content of a window.

items.name: var titleVisibility: UITitlebarTitleVisibility
items.desc: A value that indicates the visibility of the title.

items.name: enum UITitlebarTitleVisibility
items.desc: States that determine visibility of the title in the title bar.

items.name: var representedURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL of the file or resource represented in the window.

items.name: var toolbar: NSToolbar?
items.desc: The toolbar displayed beneath or integrated with the title bar.

items.name: var toolbarStyle: UITitlebarToolbarStyle
items.desc: The style of the toolbar determining its appearance and location related to the title bar.

items.name: enum UITitlebarToolbarStyle
items.desc: Styles that determine the toolbarâ€™s appearance and location related to the title bar.

items.name: var autoHidesToolbarInFullScreen: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the toolbar automatically hides in full-screen windows.
